GamepadPoseAngularVelocity.summary: The angularVelocity read-only property of the interface returns an array representing the angular velocity vector of the , in radians per second.

remarks.para: In other words, the current velocity at which the sensor is rotating around the x, y, and z axes.

GamepadPoseAngularVelocity.value: A , or null if the gamepad is not able to provide angular velocity information.
